game.title: Save the Village
game.objective: Rescue the village from the monster and save its people.
game.description: The village is under threat; a fierce creature has taken over. The player's mission is to confront the beast, protect the villagers, and restore peace.
game.reward: 750 gold coins and a mystical amulet

task.description: Travel to the edge of the forest, where the entrance to the village can be found.

task.objective: Fight the beast at the village entrance
task.description: The player must defeat the creature blocking the path before entering the village.
